summary: Completed comprehensive testing of LearnMate AI Learning Assistant. Backend APIs are functioning correctly with proper authentication protection. Frontend loads properly with responsive design, navigation, and UI elements working well. One minor backend issue with error code handling and CORS console warnings noted.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 500 instead of 400 for invalid session_id
minor_bugs.impact: Error handling inconsistency, but functionality works

integration_issues.issue: CORS policy warnings in console logs
integration_issues.note: Functionality works but shows console warnings

passed_tests: Home page loads with hero section and feature preview cards
Features page displays all 4 feature cards correctly
Protected routes redirect correctly when not authenticated
Mobile menu functionality works on small screens
Responsive design works across desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports
Topics API returns all 8 expected topics
Authentication properly protects all secured endpoints
UI elements (gradients, glass-cards, buttons) render correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fixes needed: 1) Update session processing error handling to return 400 instead of 500 for invalid session_id, 2) Review CORS configuration to eliminate console warnings. These are low priority issues that don't affect core functionality.
